articles.title: Bill Gross says Trump would be worse for bond markets than Biden - Financial Times

articles.content: A Donald Trump victory in the US presidential election would be more bearish and disruptive for the bond markets than the re-election of Joe Biden, according to Bill Gross, the longtime fixed-income … [+3414 chars]

articles.title: Hedge funds hit by lack of private equity exits - Financial Times

articles.content:
Private equitys struggle to return money to clients is hitting hedge funds, which rely on the same pension plans, foundations and endowments for fundraising.
